dcterms:description: WIDER FACE dataset consists of 393,703 annotated face bounding boxes in 32,203 images with variations in pose, scale, facial expression, occlusion, and lighting condition. It is split into training, validation, and testing sets, and defines three levels of difficulty: Easy, Medium, Hard.
dcterms:title: WIDER FACE
